Package application

Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
application.Recipe
public class Recipe
extends java.lang.Object
CardModel is a Java class representing a RecipeObject with a name, number of servings number of total calories, list of ingredients, and list of tags. Contains methods for getting and setting, as well as
Author:
Reed Olm - avr414 - UTSA CS 3443 - CookingCompanion 2021

    • Recipe

      public Recipe​(java.lang.String name, int servings, int calories, java.util.ArrayList<Ingredient> ingredients, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> prep)
      constructor: 5-arg constructor containing name, servings, total calories, list of ingredients, and list of tags
      Parameters:
      name - Name of Recipe (String)
      servings - Number of servings (int)
      calories - Number of calories (int)
      ingredients - List of all ingredients (ArrayList)
      tags - List of all tags (ArrayList)
      prep - Instructions on preparation of dish (String)
